1.title: Beyker Strit, 221b
1.plot: After suffering a contusion, medical officer John Watson was sent into retirement. He came to London with the intention of opening a private medical practice, but he even dreamed of becoming a writer. It is not known how the fate of the doctor would have been if he had not witnessed one incident that eyewitnesses considered to be an accident. And only one of the crowd said with confidence when the police arrived at the scene that this was a premeditated murder, and suggested that the doctor go to the station to testify. A new acquaintance introduced himself by ...

2.title: Kamen, nozhnitsy, bumaga
2.plot: One day a former comrade of Watson, Peter Small, comes to an apartment on Baker Street. He brings with him a trunk full of jewels. Small is wounded and dies in the arms of the doctor. Watson refuses to believe that Small is a murderer and robber. Holmes is taken to help get to the truth. Moreover, the case is mysterious and dangerous. He assumes that a gang of cab-men is operating in the city. The bait should be a photograph, which depicts all of them - still young officers, graduates of a military school, along with one of their teachers. The next day, the beautiful ...

3.title: Payatsy
3.plot: Dr. Watson notes that Holmes is very annoyed that Irene managed to steal an important photo from him. At the same time, an explosion occurred at one of the London photo studios. The photographer is killed. Holmes is invited to the military department because of what happened is suspected an attempt at state security. At the crime scene, Holmes drew attention to the broken photographic plates - on the pictures is the same stranger. Holmes hopes to make Irene Adler tell him the whole truth about the mysterious man in dark glasses. But Irene is kidnapped, and Holmes is ...

4.title: Lyubovnitsy lorda Maulbreya
4.plot: A young lady, Elizabeth Baker, comes to Baker Street. She seeks protection from Sherlock Holmes. Elizabeth fears that she may be another victim of a maniac, operating in London. Four beautiful girls had already died from the hand of an unknown man one after another. Sherlock Holmes has time to detain the killer. It turns out to be Mr. Calway - an unremarkable man in the street, whose only weakness is the game of cards. On the day Calway must be hanged, Holmes wonders: why Miss Elizabeth's parents were not in the courtroom? This circumstance seems suspicious to him.

5.title: Obryad doma Meysgreyvov
5.plot: His longtime friend, Sir Reginald Mesgrave, approached to Holmes. He is scared and is on the verge of a nervous breakdown. Sir Reginald was extremely excited because he was 33 years old, which means having to go through a mystical rite of passage, after which he would become the full owner of the entire heritage of Mesgraves. During the same rite Reginald's father was killed. And Reggie and his brother Tom became random witnesses of the tragedy. Tom is extremely dissatisfied that his brother came accompanied by strangers. The rite is available only to the initiated. ...

6.title: Galifaks
6.plot: Dr. Watson became famous. Crowds of enthusiastic readers want to see firsthand the characters of his fascinating stories. The delight of the public is not shared by either Holmes or Mrs. Hudson. Watson faces eviction from the apartment. The scandal is interrupted by a certain red-haired gentleman, who, having learned about Holmes's amazing abilities, decided to ask for help. On the same day, a remarkable incident occurs at the national bank. Someone named Ebenezer Buckley decided to exchange a whole suitcase of bills for pure gold. When Buckley left the bank, the ...

7.title: Poslednee delo Kholmsa
7.plot: In the estate of Earl Brasher during the Christmas party the organizer of the holiday is killed. Holmes, along with Dr. Watson on call of the graph immediately arrive at the crime scene. Watson is extremely surprised that Holmes is juggling evidence and putting Inspector Lestred on the wrong track. The fact is that on the evening with the verses performed one very pretty singer. She left a message to Sherlock in the form of a conventional sign. Sherlock is sure that it is a desperate plea for help. Irene Adler, the woman who broke his heart, turned to Holmes. To ...

8.title: Sobaka Baskervil
8.plot: Three years have passed since the death of Holmes. Dr. Watson married Mrs. Hudson, his stories about the famous detective are successfully reprinted. A small memorial museum opened in Baker Street. But life without adventure is boring. Therefore, when one day a young girl turns to the doctor with the old memory asking him to reveal the cause of her lover's death, Mrs. Hudson equips Watson for the case. This case is preparing him a lot of surprises and shocks. It turns out that the killing of the clerk is connected with the disappearance of secret documents, and we can...

imdb.plot outline: "Sherlock Holmes" is a Russian detective television series produced by the film company Central Partnership, filmed by director Andrey Kavun based on Arthur Conan Doyle's stories about the detective Sherlock Holmes. Eight stories about the adventures of Sherlock Holmes and Dr. John Watson have been filmed, each of which has two episodes. The series includes new versions of stories, as well as stories, first transferred to the Russian screen.
imdb.title: Sherlock Holmes
plot: A Russian crime drama series, based on the _Sherlock Holmes_ (qv) detective stories by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle.

"_Sherlock Holmes_ (qv)" is a Russian detective television series produced by the film company Central Partnership, filmed by director Andrey Kavun based on Arthur Conan Doyle's stories about the detective _Sherlock Holmes_ (qv). Eight stories about the adventures of _Sherlock Holmes_ (qv) and Dr. John Watson have been filmed, each of which has two episodes. The series includes new versions of stories, as well as stories, first transferred to the Russian screen.::Peter-Patrick76 (peter-patrick@mail.com)
synopsis: England in the 19th century. 27 year old Sherlock Holmes meets with Dr. John Watson - an experienced doctor who has just returned from the war in Afghanistan. In order to save money, they share a flat in central London with Mrs Hudson. Watson is surprised to learn that his new friend is a private detective. The Doctor realizes that he is becoming involved in an investigation, led by Holmes. Considering his young friend to be a genius, Watson decides to write about the detective's talent, and discloses the mysteries to the whole world in his stories, which often embellish events. Sherlock Holmes smokes cigarettes, but Watson comes up with the idea of the famous pipe for effect. Later, he even tries to get Holmes to smoke it for real. The two are often invited to take part in investigations by an inspector from Scotland Yard, Inspector Lestrade, whose search for the perpetrator often comes to a standstill. The genius investigator and the Doctor confronts with extraordinary villains: Professor Moriarty and charming Irene Adler.
